Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.

Author: John Calvin
Quote: We should ask God to increase our hope when it is small, awaken it when it is dormant, confirm it when it is wavering, strengthen it when it is weak, and raise it up when it is overthrown.

Author: Edward de Bono
Quote: Creativity is a great motivator because it makes people interested in what they are doing. Creativity gives hope that there can be a worthwhile idea. Creativity gives the possibility of some sort of achievement to everyone. Creativity makes life more fun and more interesting.

Author: Cormac McCarthy,  The Road
Quote: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.

Author: Lucy Christopher,  Stolen: A Letter to My Captor
Quote: You said you knew the perfect place to run to. A place that was empty of people, and buildings, and far, far away. A place covered in blood-red earth and sleeping life. A place longing to come alive again. It's a place for disappearing, you'd said, a place for getting lost... and for getting found.I'll take you there, you'd said.And I could say that I agreed.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Lucky One
Quote: It was their secret, a secret meant for just the two of them, and she'd never been able to imagine how it would sound coming from someone else. But, somehow, Logan made it sound just right.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: There is no reason why good cannot triumph as often as evil. The triumph of anything is a matter of organization. If there are such things as angels, I hope that they are organized along the lines of the Mafia.

Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote: If you follow the will of God, you know that in spite of all the terrible things that happen to you, you will never lose a final refuge. You know that the foundation of the world is love, so that even when no human being can or will help you, you may go on, trusting in the One that loves you.

Author: Henry Rollins
Quote: Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated.

Author: L.J. Smith,  The Awakening
Quote: I want him to love me as much as I love him.

Author: Orville Wright
Quote: If we all worked on the assumption that what is accepted as true is really true, there would be little hope of advance.

Author: Marie Lu,  Champion
Quote: Tell me there is still good in the world. Tell me there is still hope for all of us.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Changes
Quote: Hope is a force of nature. Don't let anyone tell you different.

Author: Bahman Ghobadi
Quote: I used to believe that people are only born once, but now I feel I have been reborn, like I was given a new life. I see myself as a child, full of energy and hope.

Author: David Archuleta,  Chords of Strength: A Memoir of Soul, Song and the Power of Perseverance
Quote: Sometimes when you least expect it, the tables turn and that scary feeling that has taken hold of you for so long somehow turns into hope

Author: David Tennant
Quote: I'm a good person, I hope. But I'm never as good as I want to be, never as nice as I want to be, never as generous as I want to be.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When someone you love says goodbye you can stare long and hard at the door they closed and forget to see all the doors God has open in front of you.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Even in the mud and scum of things, something always, always sings.

Author: إبراهيم الفقي
Quote: جرب جرب و لا تخف , فالذين صنعوا سفينة نوح كانوا من الهواة أما المحترفون فهم الذين صنعوا تيتانك !

Author: Albert Camus,  The Myth of Sisyphus and Other Essays
Quote: A man devoid of hope and conscious of being so has ceased to belong to the future.

Author: Bruce Barton
Quote: Action and reaction, ebb and flow, trial and error, change - this is the rhythm of living. Out of our over-confidence, fear; out of our fear, clearer vision, fresh hope. And out of hope, progress.

Author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help
Quote: ...and that's when I get to wondering, what would happen if I told her she something good, ever day?

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: Real life? Well, I just hope mine isn't investigated. They might find that I don't really exist - that I'm just a hologram.

Author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility
Quote: To wish was to hope, and to hope was to expect

Author: Don Shula
Quote: I think what coaching is all about, is taking players and analyzing there ability, put them in a position where they can excel within the framework of the team winning. And I hope that I've done that in my 33 years as a head coach.

Author: Alison Croggon
Quote: While the heart beats, hope lingers.

Author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut
Quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.

Author: Margaret Stohl
Quote: Darkness does not leave us easily as we would hope.

Author: Alex Campbell
Quote: I hope and trust the infinite, the eternal, and merciful and loving God. I worship Him and feel no guilt in my heart before him for what I am going to do.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I believe the way to master my destiny is to serve others. If I raise up others, am I not also raised up?

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us, that the less we use our power the greater it will be.

Author: Elizabeth Gaskell,  North and South
Quote: I wanted to see the place where Margaret grew to what she is, even at the worst time of all, when I had no hope of ever calling her mine...

Author: G.K. Chesterton
Quote: Hope is the power of being cheerful in circumstances that we know to be desperate.

Author: William Cowper
Quote: Absence from whom we love is worse than death, and frustrates hope severer than despair.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: To this day, I can never shake the connection between this boy, Peeta Mellark, and the bread that gave me hope, and the dandelion that reminded me that I was not doomed.

Author: Tite Kubo
Quote: People have hope because they cannot see Death standing behind them.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  The Handmaid's Tale
Quote: We yearned for the future. How did we learn it, that talent for insatiability?

Author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Wise Man's Fear
Quote: It’s not over if you’re still here,” Chronicler said. “It’s not a tragedy if you’re still alive.

Author: David Wells
Quote: I'm feeling pretty good right now, but I hope we can just win the whole thing and I can run off into the sunset and say good-bye.

Author: Paul Rogat Loeb,  The Impossible Will Take a Little While: A Citizen's Guide to Hope in a Time of Fear
Quote: Those who make us believe that anything’s possible and fire our imagination over the long haul, are often the ones who have survived the bleakest of circumstances. The men and women who have every reason to despair, but don’t, may have the most to teach us, not only about how to hold true to our beliefs, but about how such a life can bring about seemingly impossible social change.

Author: Jack Layton
Quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: And in despair I bowed my head;"There is no peace on earth,"I said;"For hate is strong,And mocks the songOf peace on earth, good-will to men!"Then pealed the bells more loud and deep:"God is not dead, nor doth he sleep!The Wrong shall fail,the Right prevail,With peace on earth, good-will to men!

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Lost Hero
Quote: Don't die on me,"she ordered. "You are not dying on me.""Yes, ma'am."He felt light-headed, but she was about the most beautiful thing he'd ever seen. Her hair was smoldering. Her face was smudged with soot. She had a cut on her arm, her dress was torn, and she was missing a boot. Beautiful.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quote: The rich are always going to say that, you know, just give us more money and we'll go out and spend more and then it will all trickle down to the rest of you. But that has not worked the last 10 years, and I hope the American public is catching on.

Author: Frances Hodgson Burnett
Quote: Hang in there. It is astonishing how short a time it can take for very wonderful things to happen.

Author: Toni Morrison,  Beloved
Quote: Me and you, we got more yesterday than anybody. We need some kind of tomorrow.

Author: Jane Austen,  Mansfield Park
Quote: Every moment has its pleasures and its hope.

Author: Alysha Speer
Quote: You never really know what's coming. A small wave, or maybe a big one. All you can really do is hope that when it comes, you can surf over it, instead of drown in its monstrosity.

Author: Alex Harris
Quote: We're called to be faithful, to take those first difficult steps--and to leave the results up to God.

Author: Junot Diaz
Quote: You see, in my view a writer is a writer not because she writes well and easily, because she has amazing talent, because everything she does is golden. In my view a writer is a writer because even when there is no hope, even when nothing you do shows any sign of promise, you keep writing anyway.

Author: Salman Khan
Quote: Sometimes I feel I hope I am not taking advantage of my stardom.

Author: Pope John Paul II,  Pope John Paul II: In My Own Words
Quote: I plead with you--never, ever give up on hope, never doubt, never tire, and never become discouraged. Be not afraid.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: Don’t worry if people think you’re crazy. You are crazy. You have that kind of intoxicating insanity that lets other people dream outside of the lines and become who they’re destined to be.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: You should read something else."Why would he have done that to him?"I don't know,"she said.Do you ever feel like Job?"She smiled, a little twinkle in her eyes.Sometimes."But you haven't lost your faith?"No,"I knew she hadn't, but I think I was losing mine.Is it because you think you might get better?"No,"she said,"its because its the only thing I have left.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Yesterday I was a dog. Today I'm a dog. Tomorrow I'll probably still be a dog. Sigh! There's so little hope for advancement.

Author: Karen Quan,  Write like no one is reading 2
Quote: Some of us walk around with a necklace of hope, an armour of sanity, but at the end of the day, they always come off. We reveal our naked, vulnerable, real selves.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Death is the easy part, the hard part is living and knowing you could be so much more then you’re willing to be.

Author: Howard Nemerov
Quote: I do insist on making what I hope is sense so there's always a coherent narrative or argument that the reader can follow.

Author: Thomas Browne,  Prose: "Religio Medici", "Hydriotaphia", "Garden of Cyrus", "Letter to a Friend", "Christian Morals"and Selections from Other Works
Quote: We carry within us the wonders we seek without us.

Author: Sharon Kay Penman,  When Christ and His Saints Slept
Quote: I inhale hope with every breath I take.

Author: Jackie Evancho
Quote: My advice would be to follow your dream. Most of my life, I was in second place before I came in first place. I hope that inspired people to never give up.

Author: W.B. Yeats
Quote: Hope and Memory have one daughter and her name is Art, and she has built her dwelling far from the desperate field where men hang out their garments upon forked boughs to be banners of battle. O beloved daughter of Hope and Memory, be with me for a while.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: Things will get easier, people's minds will change, and you should be alive to see it.

Author: Matthew Prior
Quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  Notes from Underground
Quote: What makes a hero? Courage, strength, morality, withstanding adversity? Are these the traits that truly show and create a hero? Is the light truly the source of darkness or vice versa? Is the soul a source of hope or despair? Who are these so called heroes and where do they come from? Are their origins in obscurity or in plain sight?

Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote: I feel no need for any other faith than my faith in the kindness of human beings. I am so absorbed in the wonder of earth and the life upon it that I cannot think of heaven and angels.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: A tamed woman will never leave her mark in the world.

Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote: There is nothing more important than your eternal salvation.

Author: Jennifer Donnelly,  Revolution
Quote: Hope is the crystal meth of emotions. It hooks you fast and kills you hard.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I want to be the best version of myself for anyone who is going to someday walk into my life and need someone to love them beyond reason.

Author: Harry Nilsson
Quote: I do believe that most men live lives of quiet desperation. For despair, optimism is the only practical solution. Hope is practical. Because eliminate that and it's pretty scary. Hope at least gives you the option of living.

Author: Rohinton Mistry,  A Fine Balance
Quote: You see, we cannot draw lines and compartments and refuse to budge beyond them. Sometimes you have to use your failures as stepping-stones to success. You have to maintain a fine balance between hope and despair.' He paused, considering what he had just said. 'Yes', he repeated. 'In the end, it's all a question of balance.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Lost Souls
Quote: It was stupid to hope, she knew. But sometimes hope was all you had.

Author: Otto Frank
Quote: I just can't think how I would go on without children having lost Edith already... It's too upsetting for me to write about them. Naturally, I still hope, and wait, wait, wait.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible
Quote: I don’t know what’s in the box, but I love it. Unopened gifts contain hope.

Author: Cristina Marrero
Quote: We never know when our last day on earth will be. So, love with full sincerity, believe with true faith, and hope with all of your might. Better to have lived in truth and discovered life, than to have lived half heartedly and died long before you ever ceased breathing.

Author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year
Quote: Never give up. It's like breathing—once you quit, your flame dies letting total darkness extinguish every last gasp of hope. You can't do that. You must continue taking in even the shallowest of breaths, continue putting forth even the smallest of efforts to sustain your dreams. Don't ever, ever, ever give up.

Author: Angela Merkel
Quote: Overcoming the Cold War required courage from the people of Central and Eastern Europe and what was then the German Democratic Republic, but it also required the steadfastness of Western partner over many decades when many had long lost hope of integration of the two Germanys and Europe.

Author: Eiichiro Oda
Quote: Whether we wound or are wounded, the blood that flows is red.

Author: Tamora Pierce
Quote: As long as there's life, there's hope.

Author: Jocelyn Soriano,  Mend My Broken Heart
Quote: It is our wounds that create in us a desire to reach for miracles. The fulfillment of such miracles depends on whether we let our wounds pull us down or lift us up towards our dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love used to be my lighthouse, and now it feels like I'm treading water in the dark. I’ll bet as soon as I start swimming, the sun will rise and color the sky with the romance of rose.

Author: X. Williamson,  Distract My Hunger
Quote: I could recognise his soul in mine as much as he could find me in his. Our sole existences seemed to have been for this very moment when nothing else mattered.

Author: Ann Patchett,  State of Wonder
Quote: Hope is a horrible thing, you know. I don't know who decided to package hope as a virtue because it's not. It's a plague. Hope is like walking around with a fishhook in your mouth and somebody just keeps pulling it and pulling it.

Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.

Author: Timothy Keller,  The Meaning of Marriage: Facing the Complexities of Commitment with the Wisdom of God
Quote: The gospel is this: We are more sinful and flawed in ourselves than we ever dared believe, yet at the very same time we are more loved and accepted in Jesus Christ than we ever dared hope.

Author: John F. Kennedy
Quote: I hope that no American will waste his franchise and throw away his vote by voting either for me or against me solely on account of my religious affiliation. It is not relevant.

Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote: The way to screw up somebody's life is to give them what they want.

Author: Arthur Rimbaud,  Season in Hell & Other Poems
Quote: À l'aurore, armés d'une ardente patience, nous entrerons aux splendides Villes. (In the dawn, armed with a burning patience, we shall enter the splendid Cities.)

Author: Debra Anastasia,  Poughkeepsie
Quote: You make the rest of the beautiful things in the world cry for even trying at all. You make it hard for me to breathe.

Author: Roopleen,  Words to inspire the winner in YOU
Quote: The world’s greatest achievers have been those who have always stayed focussed on their goals and have been consistent in their efforts.

Author: Niels Bohr
Quote: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Fear is the glue that keeps you stuck. Faith is the solvent that sets you free.

Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote: Keep a light, hopeful heart. But ­expect the worst.

Author: Randa Abdel-Fattah,  Does My Head Look Big In This?
Quote: Sometimes it's easy to lose faith in people. And sometimes one act of kindness is all it takes to give you hope again.

Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote: Now science has presented us with a hope called stem cell research, which may provide our scientists with many answers that have for so long been beyond our grasp.

Author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still
Quote: I’ll make a swing so I can reach the places I can’t reach yet.

Author: Karen Blixen
Quote: When you have a great and difficult task, something perhaps almost impossible, if you only work a little at a time, every day a little, suddenly the work will finish itself.

Author: Chris Colfer,  The Wishing Spell
Quote: Right now, we're living in an ugly chapter of our lives, but books always get better!

Author: Sarah Dessen
Quote: Look,” he said, “the point is there’s no way to be a hundred percent sure about anyone or anything. So you’re left with a choice. Either hope for the best, or just expect the worst.”If you expect the worst, you’re never disappointed,” I pointed out.Yeah, but who lives like that?

Author: April Winchell
Quote: I wish you a tolerable Thursday. That's all any of us can hope for.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Angel's Game
Quote: We all give up great expectations along the way.

Author: George Eliot,  Middlemarch
Quote: what we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope.

Author: Mary Karr,  Lit
Quote: What hurts so bad about youth isn't the actual butt whippings the world delivers. It's the stupid hopes playacting like certainties.

Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote: You cannot live to please everyone else. You have to edify, educate and fulfill your own dreams and destiny, and hope that whatever your art is that you're putting out there, if it's received, great, I respect you for receiving it. If it's not received, great, I respect you for not.

Author: Jamie Ford,  Hotel on the Corner of Bitter and Sweet
Quote: He'd do what he always did, find the sweet among the bitter.

Author: Alexander Pope,  An Essay on Man
Quote: Hope springs eternal in the human breast; Man never Is, but always To be blest. The soul, uneasy, and confin'd from home, Rests and expatiates in a life to come.

Author: Kate Middleton
Quote: Yes, well I really hope I can make a difference, even in the smallest way. I am looking forward to helping as much as I can.

Author: Perry Moore,  Hero
Quote: I caught myself thinking about falling in love with someone who I hoped was out there right now thinking about the possibility of me, but I quickly banished the notion. It was that kind of thinking that landed me in this situation to begin with. Hope can ruin you.

Author: Padre Pio
Quote: Pray, hope, and don't worry. Worry is useless. God is merciful and will hear your prayer.

Author: Rick Yancey,  The Isle of Blood
Quote: But hope is no less realistic than despair. It is still our choice whether to live in light or lie down in darkness.

Author: Elif Shafak
Quote: Whatever happens in your life, no matter how troubling things might seem, do not enter the neighbourhood of despair.Even when all doors remain closed, God wil open up a new path only for you. Be thankful! It is easy to be thankful when all is well. A Sufi is thankful not only for what he has been given but also for all that has been denied.

Author: Henning Mankell
Quote: I am not afraid of dying. I have lived longer than most people in the world. What scares me is to have a body that works but a brain that is waving goodbye. If that happens, I hope I die quickly.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  The Autobiography of Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: There is nothing more majestic than the determined courage of individuals willing to suffer and sacrifice for their freedom and dignity.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.

Author: Stanley Kunitz
Quote: I can hardly wait for tomorrow, it means a new life for me each and every day.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: It all counts,' Adam said again. 'And the bottom line is, what defines you isn't how many times you crash, but the number of times you get back on the bike. As long as it's one more, you're all good.-pg 325 Along for the Ride

Author: W. C. Fields
Quote: When we have lost everything, including hope, life becomes a disgrace, and death a duty.

Author: John Mayer
Quote: I hope that what it comes down to at the end of the day is that people believe that I believe what I'm singing. It comes down to being believable. You don't have to be likeable; generally, though, I think I am.

Author: Stevie Nicks
Quote: Love is only one fine star away.

Author: Shannon Hale,  Book of a Thousand Days
Quote: Sometimes my fancy gets to floating inside me, threatening to carry me away like a leaf on a wind. Better to be a stone.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: Therefore, since we are receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken, let us be thankful, and so worship God acceptably with reverence and awe, for our God is a consuming fire.

Author: Kate DiCamillo,  The Tale of Despereaux
Quote: Reader, do you think it is a terrible thing to hope when there is really no reason to hope at all? Or is it (as the soldier said about happiness) something that you might just as well do, since,in the end, it really makes no difference to anyone but you?

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: There was a moment in my life when I really wanted to kill myself. And there was one other moment when I was close to that. But even in my most jaded times, I had some hope.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King
Quote: Above all shadows rides the Sunand Stars for ever dwell:I will not say the Day is done,nor bid the Stars farewell.

Author: Roger Hedden,  Bodies, Rest and Motion.
Quote: When you don't know where you're going, you drive on the highway.

Author: Mariah Carey
Quote: when you feel like hope is gone, look inside you and be strong and you'll finally see the truth- that hero lies in you.

Author: Alfred Nobel
Quote: Hope is nature's veil for hiding truth's nakedness.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: The best kind of humans are the ones who stay.

Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote: Poets are damned… but see with the eyes of angels.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When you look at the past without God’s eyes, you subject yourself to deception. The past no longer exists and God doesn’t linger there. However, Satan will show you whatever you want to see and believe, so you will be trapped in an emotion that cannot communicate truth, beyond what you want to remember.

Author: Peter Kreeft
Quote: In an age of hope men looked up at the night sky and saw “the heavens."In an age of hopelessness they call it simply “space.

Author: James Cameron
Quote: Every time you dive, you hope you'll see something new - some new species. Sometimes the ocean gives you a gift, sometimes it doesn't.

Author: Whoopi Goldberg
Quote: We're here for a reason. I believe a bit of the reason is to throw little torches out to lead people through the dark.

Author: Joss Whedon
Quote: The times are chaotic. For me, I would hope that people look at [Angel] and gain strength by it. With everything that I do, I hope that they see people struggling to live decent, moral lives in a completely chaotic world. They see how hard it is, how often they fail, and how they get up and keep trying. That, to me, is the most important message I'm ever going to tell.

Author: Ned Vizzini,  It's Kind of a Funny Story
Quote: We look into each other's eyes as we shake. His are still full of death and horror, but in them I see my face reflected, and inside my tiny eyes inside his, I think I see some hope.

Author: Sarah Ban Breathnach
Quote: Faith is the very first thing you should pack in a hope chest.

Author: Anna Kamieńska
Quote: Tell me what’s the differencebetween hope and waitingbecause my heart doesn’t knowIt constantly cuts itself on the glass of waitingIt constantly gets lost in the fog of hope

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King
Quote: Courage will now be your best defence against the storm that is at hand-—that and such hope as I bring.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: We need never be without hope because we can never be irreparably broken.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: For so many years, I couldn’t understand why every time I thought that someone finally loved me, like… for real, they would eventually turn to vapor. Every person whom I’ve ever loved is trapped inside of my chest. I’ve breathed all of them in so deeply that I’ve nearly choked and died on every soul that I’ve ever given myself to.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Sometimes the most beautiful people are beautifully broken.

Author: José Martí
Quote: A child who does not think about what happens around him and is content with living without wondering whether he lives honestly is like a man who lives from a scoundrel's work and is on the road to being a scoundrel.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: We swallowed the chaos because we knew we didn't want to be ordinary.

Author: Jesse Tyler Ferguson
Quote: Chemistry is one of these crazy things you can't teach or learn or you can't fake. You go in hoping it will work, hope that you will connect with the other actors. I was fortunate on 'Modern Family' and 'The Procession.' They are great people, very easy to like.

Author: Emily Maguire,  Taming the Beast
Quote: But then, life is a constant withering of possibilities. Some are stolen with the lives of people you love. Others are let go, with regret and reluctance and deep, deep sorrow. But there is compensation for lives unlived in the intoxicating joy of knowing that the life you have - right here, right now - if the one you have chosen. There is power in that, and hope.

Author: Lemony Snicket
Quote: All cannot be lost when there is still so much being found

Author: Arthur Wing Pinero
Quote: While there is tea, there is hope."(Sweet Lavender)

Author: Václav Havel
Quote: Hope is not the conviction that something will turn out well, but the certainty that something makes sense, regardless of how it turns out.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: But dear, don’t be afraid of love it’s only magic.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Before I Fall
Quote: Hope keeps you alive.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  The End
Quote: I am heartbroken, but I have been heartbroken before, and this might be the best for which I can hope.

Author: Rick Warren,  The Purpose Driven Life: What on Earth Am I Here for?
Quote: Without God, life has no purpose, and without purpose, life has no meaning. Without meaning, life has no significance or hope.

Author: Macaulay Culkin
Quote: I hope people don't think I'm crazy, because I'm not.

Author: Norman Vincent Peale
Quote: Believe it is possible to solve your problem. Tremendous things happen to the believer. So believe the answer will come. It will.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 1: Preludes and Nocturnes
Quote: I am hope.

Author: Ian McEwan,  Saturday
Quote: There's a taste in the air, sweet and vaguely antiseptic, that reminds him of his teenage years in these streets, and of a general state of longing, a hunger for life to begin that from this distance seems like happiness.

Author: Robert James Waller,  The Bridges of Madison County
Quote: And in that moment, everything I knew to be true about myself up until then was gone. I was acting like another woman, yet I was more myself than ever before.

Author: Arthur Miller
Quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.

Author: Madeleine L'Engle,  A Wrinkle in Time
Quote: Euripedes. Nothing is hopeless; we must hope for everything.

Author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure
Quote: Saving YouThe darkness takes him over, the sickness pulls him in; his eyes—a blown out candle, I wish to go with him.Sometimes I see a flicker— a light that shone from them; I hold him to me tightly, before he's gone again.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: To have faith is to be sure of the things we hope for, to be certain of the things we cannot see.

Author: Bethany Griffin,  Masque of the Red Death
Quote: Bursts of hope make despair harder to live with.

Author: Rick Riordan
Quote: Hope does not leave without being given permission.

Author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places
Quote: The future is uncertain, but that can be a good thing.

Author: Walt Disney
Quote: I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained.

Author: William Shakespeare,  King Lear
Quote: And worse I may be yet: the worst is notSo long as we can say 'This is the worst.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón
Quote: Time has taught me not to lose hope, yet not to trust too much in hope either.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: It felt like I'd been living underground, and for a moment, I'd been given this glimpse of the sky. Once you've seen that, how can you go back where you came from?

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Hope is the magic carpet that transports us from the present moment into the realm of infinite possibilities.

Author: Switchfoot
Quote: I find peace when I'm confused, I find hope when I'm let down, not in me but in you.

Author: Chester Nimitz
Quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right, even though I think it is hopeless.

Author: Martin Buber
Quote: We can be redeemed only to the extent to which we see ourselves.

Author: Melina Marchetta,  Finnikin of the Rock
Quote: Then I choose to drown. In hope. Rather than float into nothing.

Author: Linkin Park
Quote: Do you feel cold and lost in desperation? You build up hope, but failure’s all you’ve known Remember all the sadness and frustration And let it go. Let it go

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: Should we continue to look upwards? Is the light we can see in the sky one of those which will presently be extinguished? The ideal is terrifying to behold... brilliant but threatened on all sides by the dark forces that surround it: nevertheless, no more in danger than a star in the jaws of the clouds.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: The difference between hope and despair is a different way of telling stories from the same facts.

Author: B. C. Forbes
Quote: He who has faith has... an inward reservoir of courage, hope, confidence, calmness, and assuring trust that all will come out well - even though to the world it may appear to come out most badly.

Author: Christopher Reeve
Quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés,  Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype
Quote: Failure is a greater teacher than success

Author: Pittacus Lore,  I Am Number Four
Quote: Hope?” he says. “There is always hope, John. New developments have yet to present themselves. Not all the information is in. No. Don’t give up hope just yet. It’s the last thing to go. When you have lost hope, you have lost everything. And when you think all is lost, when all is dire and bleak, there is always hope.

Author: Jeri Smith-Ready,  Shade
Quote: Aura, I'm really patient, but I'm not a bloody saint.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I can do this… I can start over. I can save my own life and I’m never going to be alone as long as I have stars to wish on and people to still love.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.

Author: John Piper,  A Sweet and Bitter Providence: Sex, Race, and the Sovereignty of God
Quote: There is hope in forgiveness

Author: Abu Bakr al-Siddiq
Quote: O Allah, You know me better than I know myself, and I know myself better than these people who praise me. Make me better than what they think of me, and forgive those sins of mine of which they have no knowledge, and do not hold me responsible for what they say.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.

Author: Erin Hunter
Quote: The only true borders lie between day and night, between life and death, between hope and loss.

Author: Ogden Nash
Quote: Middle age is when you're sitting at home on a Saturday night and the telephone rings and you hope it isn't for you.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Why Be Happy When You Could Be Normal?
Quote: I know now, after fifty years, that the finding/losing, forgetting/remembering, leaving/returning, never stops. The whole of life is about another chance, and while we are alive, till the very end, there is always another chance.

Author: Ally Carter,  Only the Good Spy Young
Quote: I know too well how dangerous hope can be, how it grows and sometimes dies, taking its host with it. It's more powerful than anything Dr.Fibs keeps in his labs, more precious than all the secrets inside Sublevel Two.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When you see people only as personalities, rather than souls with life missions to fulfill, you forever limit the growth and possibilities of what God has in store for another person.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: It’s funny, for all it took was a broken heart and that alone was enough, enough for her to do everything she ever dreamed of.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  The Kingdom of God Is Within You
Quote: In the midst of winter, I find within me the invisible summer...

Author: ZOEgirl,  Zoegirl - Different Kind of Free
Quote: To be unbroken, what would that be?If words that were spoken, had not shattered me

Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote: For love would be love of the wrong thing; there is yet faith, But the faith and the love and the hope are all in the waiting.

Author: George Gordon Byron
Quote: But what is Hope? Nothing but the paint on the face of Existence; the least touch of truth rubs it off, and then we see what a hollow-cheeked harlot we have got hold of.

Author: Henri Bergson,  Time and Free Will
Quote: The idea of the future, pregnant with an infinity of possibilities, is thus more fruitful than the future itself, and this is why we find more charm in hope than in possession, in dreams than in reality.

Author: Toni Robinson
Quote: Horses change lives. They give out young people confidence and self-esteem. They provide peace and tranquility to troubled souls, they give us hope.

Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote: I hope for nothing. I fear nothing. I am free.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The sun shall always rise upon a new day and there shall always be a rose garden within me. Yes, there is a part of me that is broken, but my broken soil gives way to my wild roses.

Author: Dave Ramsey
Quote: Pray like it all depends on God, but work like it all depends on you.

Author: Aberjhani,  The River of Winged Dreams
Quote: Love, Mercy, and Grace, sisters all, attend your wounds of silence and hope.

Author: Betty Smith
Quote: There had to be dark and muddy waters so that the sun could have something to background it's flashing glory.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  The Weight of Glory
Quote: At present we are on the outside of the world, the wrong side of the door. We discern the freshness and purity of morning, but they do not make us fresh and pure. We cannot mingle with the splendours we see. But all the leaves of the New Testament are rustling with the rumour that it will not always be so. Some day, God willing, we shall get in.

Author: Jamie Ford,  Hotel on the Corner of Bitter and Sweet
Quote: Hope can get you through anything.

Author: Christine de Pizan,  Ditié de Jehanne d'Arc
Quote: [A] person whose head is bowed and whose eyes are heavy cannot look at the light.

Author: Isaiah Mustafa
Quote: I hope that my daughter grows up empowered and doesn't define herself by the way she looks but by qualities that make her a intelligent, strong and responsible woman.

Author: Angela N. Blount,  Once Upon a Road Trip
Quote: Everybody’s damaged. It’s just a question of how badly, and whether you’re healing or still bleeding.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Flirt
Quote: Hope will lie to you, but lust is what it is; it never lies.

Author: Ray Lamontagne
Quote: And when all your faith is gone let it be me, if it's a friend you need let it be me

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: Because hope comes from in you, and wishes are just magic.

Author: A Fine Frenzy
Quote: Is there a chance?A fragment of light at the end of the tunnel?A reason to fight?Is there a chance you may change your mind?Or are we ashes and wine?

Author: Nadia Sahari,  Breakaway: How I Survived Abuse
Quote: IT IS BY CHOICE AND NOT BY CHANCES THAT WE CHANGE OUR CIRCUMSTANCES.

Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote: In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding
Quote: I came to the conclusion that unrealized hopes, even small ones, were always wrenching.

Author: Anne Carson
Quote: To be running breathlessly, but not yet arrived, is itself delightful, a suspended moment of living hope.

Author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut
Quote: Love without hope will not survive.Love without faith changes nothing.Love gives power to hope and faith.

Author: James Hillman,  Suicide and the Soul
Quote: To hope for nothing, to expect nothing, to demand nothing. This is analytical despair.

Author: Martina Boone,  Compulsion
Quote: Love doesn't come with an on-off switch. It's made of too many threads of memory and hope and heartache that weave themselves into the very core of who you are.

Author: Rene Descartes
Quote: I hope that posterity will judge me kindly, not only as to the things which I have explained, but also to those which I have intentionally omitted so as to leave to others the pleasure of discovery.

Author: Andrew Davidson
Quote: Some day soon,"Lance said, "you'll walk out of here and have to decide how you're going to live the rest of your lives. Will you be defined by what other people see, or by the essence of your soul?

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Seduce Me at Sunrise
Quote: A weak but steady throb lay beneath Kev's searching fingertips. Win's heartbeat...the pulse that sustained his universe.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  The Silver Chair
Quote: I have come,"said a deep voice behind them. They turned and saw the Lion himself, so bright and real and strong that everything else began at once to look pale and shadowy compared with him.

Author: John Henry Jowett
Quote: Life without thankfulness is devoid of love and passion. Hope without thankfulness is lacking in fine perception. Faith without thankfulness lacks strength and fortitude. Every virtue divorced from thankfulness is maimed and limps along the spiritual road.

Author: José Martí
Quote: But love, like the sun that it is, sets afire and melts everything. what greed and privilege to build up over whole centuries the indignation of a pious spirit, with its natural following of oppressed souls, will cast down with a single shove.

Author: Linkin Park
Quote: You were standing in the wake of devastation And you were waiting on the edge of the unknown And with the cataclysm raining down Insides crying "Save me now"You were there, impossibly alone

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  Duino Elegies
Quote: Look: the trees exist; the houseswe dwell in stand there stalwartly.  Only wepass by it all, like a rush of air.And everything conspires to keep quiet about us,half out of shame perhaps, half out of some secret hope.

Author: Hillary Clinton
Quote: The worst thing that can happen in a democracy - as well as in an individual's life - is to become cynical about the future and lose hope.

Author: Brenda Farrar-ejemai
Quote: Be Sure To Notice When You're Happy

Author: Seamus Heaney
Quote: History says, Don’t hopeOn this side of the grave,But then, once in a lifetimeThe longed-for tidal waveOf justice can rise up,And hope and history rhyme

Author: Virgil,  The Aeneid
Quote: Una Salus Victis Nullam Sperare Salutem - (Latin - written 19 BC)The only hope for the doomed, is no hope at all...

Author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary
Quote: Religion, n. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.

Author: Isaac Marion,  Warm Bodies
Quote: ...and we'll see what happens when we say Yes while this rigor mortis world screams No.

Author: Mick Jagger
Quote: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope.

Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote: I always thought old age would be a writer’s best chance. Whenever I read the late work of Goethe or W. B. Yeats I had the impertinence to identify with it. Now, my memory’s gone, all the old fluency’s disappeared. I don’t write a single sentence without saying to myself, ‘It’s a lie!’ So I know I was right. It’s the best chance I’ve ever had.

Author: George Eliot,  Daniel Deronda
Quote: Let my body dwell in poverty, and my hands be as the hands of the toiler; but let my soul be as a temple of remembrance where the treasures of knowledge enter and the inner sanctuary is hope.

Author: Albert Pike
Quote: We must pass through the darkness, to reach the light.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage
Quote: We truly believed in something back then, and we knew we were the kind of people capable of believing in something - with all our hearts. And that kind of hope will never simply vanish.

Author: Juan de la Cruz
Quote: Well and good if all things change, O Lord God, provided I am rooted in You.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I wish every envelope enclosed a love letter. It’s this hope that leads me to open strangers’ mail. So you see, I’m a romantic, not an NSA employee.

Author: Hal Lindsey
Quote: Man can live about forty days without food, about three days without water, about eight minutes without air...but only for one second without hope.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Ruin and Rising
Quote: Hope was tricky like water. Somehow it always found a way in.

Author: Thomas Hardy,  Tess of the D'Urbervilles
Quote: Let truth be told - women do as a rule live through such humiliations, and regain their spirits, and again look about them with an interested eye. While there's life there's hope is a connviction not so entirely unknown to the "betrayed"as some amiable theorists would have us believe.

Author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
Quote: When hope is fleeting, stop for a moment and visualize, in a sky of silver, the crescent of a lavender moon. Imagine it -- delicate, slim, precise, like a paper-thin slice from a cabochon jewel.It may not be very useful, but it is beautiful.And sometimes it is enough.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: I had to learn to live without you and I couldn't make sense of it, because I left so much of me inside of you.

Author: Yves Saint Laurent

Author: Vladimir Lenin
Quote: Unity is a great thing and a great slogan. But what the workers’ cause needs is the unity of Marxists, not unity between Marxists, and opponents and distorters of Marxism.

Author: T.D. Jakes
Quote: Unforgiveness denies the victim the possibility of parole and leaves them stuck in the prison of what was, incarcerating them in their trauma and relinquishing the chance to escape beyond the pain.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Son of Neptune

Author: P.C. Cast,  Destined
Quote: But she loves me. Me. Just the way I am.

Author: Nafisa Haji,  The Writing on My Forehead
Quote: that there are many things that we cant understand. the past. the bad things that happened... and we become afraid. of what might happen in the future. its okay to be afraid. but we have to keep hoping and believeing... to keep hoping and trying our best to be good and do good. even when we're afraid

Author: Howard Zinn,  You Can't Be Neutral on a Moving Train: A Personal History of Our Times

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: I hope I make people feel better. I hope I take people out of their situations a little bit and make them happier. That's really why I do what I do.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: If I lived a million lives, I would've felt a million feelings and I still would've fallen a million times for you.

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: It will get easier each time, I think. I hope. I just have to keep trying.

Author: Lalu Prasad Yadav

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think. So start each day by thinking of all the things you have to be thankful for. Your future will depend very largely on the thoughts you think today. So think thoughts of hope and confidence and love and success.

Author: Shiro Amano,  Kingdom Hearts, Vol. 1
Quote: You'll be okay. No matter what shape reality takes, you can handle it.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  The Book of Questions
Quote: Donde termina el arco iris,en tu alma o en el horizonte?Where does the rainbow end,in your soul or on the horizon?

Author: Toba Beta,  My Ancestor Was an Ancient Astronaut
Quote: Hope attracts chances.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Succubus on Top
Quote: For every bad thing in life, there are more good things to tip the balance.

Author: Sylvain Reynard,  Gabriel's Inferno
Quote: She comforted him in his darkness and gave him hope. She seemed to cherish a sincere affection for him, despite his failings. 'She saved me'.

Author: Juliet Marillier,  Son of the Shadows
Quote: And as I watched him, I knew that in every dark night there was, somewhere, a small light burning that could never be quenched.

Author: Shannon K. Butcher
Quote: A person can do incredible things if he or she has enough hope.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: The human soul has still greater need of the ideal than of the real. It is by the real that we exist, it is by the ideal that we live.

Author: Raymond Williams
Quote: To be truly radical is to make hope possible rather than despair convincing

Author: Martin Keogh,  Hope Beneath Our Feet: Restoring Our Place in the Natural World
Quote: When asked if I am pessimistic or optimistic about the future, my answer is always the same: if you look at the science about what is happening on earth and aren't pessimistic, you don't understand the data. But if you meet the people who are working to restore this earth and the lives of the poor, and you aren't optimistic, you haven't got a pulse.

Author: Jefferson Smith,  Strange Places
Quote: There is no such thing as helplessness. It's just another word for giving up.

Author: Richard Ford,  The Sportswriter
Quote: If you lose all hope, you can always find it again.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
Quote: Beware how you take away hope from another human being

Author: Cormac McCarthy,  The Road
Quote: Carry the fire.

Author: John Sentamu
Quote: The Gospel offers forgiveness for the past, new life for the present, and hope for the future.

Author: Debra Anastasia
Quote: Don't put off happiness you can have today. Tomorrow is a hope, not a promise

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: Don't despair: despair suggests you are in total control and know what is coming. You don't - surrender to events with hope.

Author: David Levithan,  Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
Quote: My pride shut me up, my hurt shut me down, and together they ganged up on my hope and let her get away.

Author: Anne Stevenson
Quote: Mind led bodyto the edge of the precipice.They stared in desireat the naked abyss.If you love me, said mind,take that step into silence.If you love me, said body,turn and exist.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Sure, I had hopes and dreams before working at @McDonalds. I used to want to be a dancer and a gardener and grow movement on a farm in Iowa.

Author: Ron Sanders
Quote: CONCERNED BUT NOT CONSUMED!

Author: Laurie Halse Anderson,  Chains
Quote: She cannot chain my soul. Yes, she could hurt me. She'd already done so...I would bleed, or not. Scar, or not. Live, or not. But she could not hurt my soul, not unless I gave it to her.

Author: Gail Caldwell,  Let's Take the Long Way Home: A Memoir of Friendship
Quote: Hope in the beginning feels like such a violation of the loss, and yet without it we couldn't survive.

Author: Chris Bradford,  The Ring of Earth
Quote: hope for the best, prepare for the worst

Author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Edgar Allan Poe: Selected Poems
Quote: You call it hope — that fire of fire!It is but agony of desire.

Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote: There are three lessons I would write-Three words, as with a burning pen, In tracings of eternal light,Upon the heart of men.Have hope! though clouds environ round,And gladness hides her face in scorn,Put thou the shadow from thy brow,No night but hath its morn.Have love! not love alone for one, But man as man thy brother call,And scatter like the circling sun,Thy charities on all.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: If we had no hope - for a cure, for winning the lottery, for falling in love, for the end of war, for being free of abuse, or for having food, warmth, clothing, and shelter - we would have no reason to go on. What you hope for doesn't matter, but rather the essence of hope itself.

Author: Michael Collins
Quote: I knew I was alone in a way that no earthling has ever been before.

Author: Adi Alsaid,  Let's Get Lost
Quote: It was time to let go of the mad desire to remember. It was time to start living whatever life would come. In the present, not the past.

Author: Chris Bradford,  The Way of the Dragon
Quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.

Author: Stanley Kubrick
Quote: The screen is a magic medium. It has such power that it can retain interest as it conveys emotions and moods that no other art form can hope to tackle.

Author: Dan Wells,  Partials
Quote: Jayden laughed grimly. 'Press the attack and hope for the best.''Hope is not a strategy,' said Kira'It's not plan A,' said Jayden, 'and it shouldn't be plan B, but it is every plan C that has ever been made.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I’ve always seen this in you, ever since you were a little girl — this hunger to love other people into their highest selves and it’s what has made me irreversibly and just so forever in love with you.

Author: Ali Shariati
Quote: I like Dancing of Indian girls more than my parents’ prayers . Because they dance with love and passion . But my parents just say their prayers because they got used to it .

Author: Michael A. Singer,  The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself

Because you've been taught that, you feel guilt and fear. But guilt and fear do not open you connection to the Divine; they only serve to close your heart. The reality is that God's way is love, and you can see this for yourself.

Author: Ralph H. Blum
Quote: Nothing is predestined. The obstacles of your past can become the gateways that lead to new beginnings.

Author: Helen Keller,  The Open Door
Quote: It has been said that life has treated me harshly; and sometimes I have complained in my heart because many pleasures of human experience have been withheld from me…if much has been denied me, much, very much, has been given me…

Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote: A great tennis career is something that a 15-year-old normally doesn't have. I hope my example helps other teens believe they can accomplish things they never thought possible.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: Maybe I hope too much. Maybe I dream too much or maybe I love too much to just give up on you.

Author: Steven James,  How to Smell Like God: True Stories Burning with the Scent of Heaven
Quote: God dances with the outcast.

Author: Melissa Marr,  Wicked Lovely

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Lipstick Jungle
Quote: Thank goodness for the first snow, it was a reminder--no matter how old you became and how much you'd seen, things could still be new if you were willing to believe they still mattered.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Son of Neptune
Quote: Hope,"Frank grumbled. "I'd rather have a few good weasels.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.,  Life's Little Instruction Book
Quote: Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures.

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: The devil, darkness, and death may swagger and boast, the pangs of life will sting for a while longer, but don't worry; the forces of evil are breathing their last. Not to worry...He's risen!

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She was broken from moment to moment, watching her world collide she felt lost inside herself. She fell apart for a passion that flamed beneath her. She waited and died a hundred times, it dripped from her pores. The moment she let go, she soared over the stillness like the star she was born to be.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: It was never about the world being too big, it was more like she was too much for the world to handle.

Author: Janet Fitch,  White Oleander
Quote: What can I say about life? Do I praise it for letting you live, or damn it for allowing the rest?

Author: Bryant McGill,  Voice of Reason
Quote: The greatest joys in life are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in our quiet hopes and labors for others.

Author: Kay Redfield Jamison
Quote: There is always a part of my mind that is preparing for the worst, and another part of my mind that believes if I prepare enough for it, the worst won’t happen.

Author: Vera Brittain,  Testament of Youth
Quote: How fortunate we were who still had hope I did not then realise; I could not know how soon the time would come when we should have no more hope, and yet be unable to die

Author: Jackie Chan
Quote: I really hope someday in Hollywood, some producer or director will hire me only to do drama.

Author: David Almond,  My Name Is Mina
Quote: Anything seems possible at night when the rest of the world has gone to sleep.

Author: John Johnson
Quote: Men and women are not limited by the place of their birth, not by color of their skin, but by the size of their hope.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: As the earth dies your spirit will bloom; as the world fades your soul will rise and glisten. Amongst the dehydrated crevices of a desert earth you will stumble upon your diamonds; in between the dry skulls and cracked bones you will find your sapphires.

Author: Patch Adams
Quote: I'm great at a deathbed. I've never given tranquillisers or psychiatric medicine. I've given love and fun and creativity and passion and hope, and these things ease suffering.

Author: Toba Beta
Quote: No one knows for sure that that tomorrow won't come, but most people assume that tomorrow will still exist as usual. This is Toba's Paradox, which means, hope overcomes doubt.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: True hope is swift, and flies with swallow's wings.

Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote: If it were not for hopes, the heart would break.

Author: Roberta Karim
Quote: The path i walk lights up in flames

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Gregor and the Code of Claw
Quote: If you hit bottom, there's a whole lot of people here to help you up

Author: Steven L. Peck,  A Short Stay in Hell
Quote: The days passed in a dream. I pictured our reunion again and again, played it out in my mind over and over until I’d almost worn a groove in my thoughts, so deep that it seemed the only thing I could think of was our reunion. Anticipation is a gift. Perhaps there is none greater. Anticipation is born of hope. Indeed it is hope’s finest expression. In hope’s loss, however, is the greatest despair.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth
Quote: I love him in ways that I can’t explain to other people. They don’t understand… it’s not their fault.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Power and the Glory
Quote: Hope was an instinct only the reasoning human mind could kill. An animal never knew despair.

Author: Robert H. Goddard
Quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.

Author: Sara Zarr,  Once Was Lost
Quote: I wonder how you're supposed to know the exact moment when there's no more hope.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She wildly burned for the one she loved and he stood there watching, hoping he too would catch a blaze from the violence stirring in her heart.

Author: Susane Colasanti,  Something Like Fate
Quote: Rien ne va arrêter ma quête pour te trouver"No one will stop my quest to find you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible
Quote: Love is the most precious gift you could ever possibly hope to steal. Some women foolishly do not leave their rib cages locked at night.

Author: Carl Sagan,  Pale Blue Dot: A Vision of the Human Future in Space
Quote: The visions we offer our children shape the future. It _matters_ what those visions are. Often they become self-fulfilling prophecies. Dreams are maps.

Author: Anne Bronte
Quote: It seems as if life and hope must cease together.

Author: Carol Matas,  Daniel's Story
Quote: We are alive. We are human, with good and bad in us. That's all we know for sure. We can't create a new species or a new world. That's been done. Now we have to live within those boundaries . What are our choices? We can despair and curse, and change nothing. We can choose evil like our enemies have done and create a world based on hate. Or we can try to make things better.

Author: A.R. Ammons,  Sphere: The Form of a Motion
Quote: Things go away to return, brightened for the passage

Author: Aaron B. Powell,  Doomsday Diaries III: Luke the Protector
Quote: The world is a goddamned evil place, the strong prey on the weak, the rich on the poor; I’ve given up hope that there is a God that will save us all. How am I supposed to believe that there’s a heaven and a hell when all I see now is hell.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: A Plan B life can be just as good or better than a Plan A life. You just have to let go of that first dream and realize that God has already written the first chapter of the new life that awaits you. All you have to do is start reading!

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I feel a resurgence of my 6-year-old self… that little warrior, goddess of a girl reminding me of who I was when I was little, before the world got its hands on me.

Author: Landon Parham,  First Night of Summer
Quote: Life isn't just about darkness or light, rather it's about finding light within the darkness.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth
Quote: If ever I was running, it was towards you.

Author: Malorie Blackman,  Boys Don't Cry
Quote: The point is, you have family and friends who love you. You have a world out there just waiting for you to conquer it. You have a life that will be anything you make it. That's the point.

Author: Aprilynne Pike,  Spells
Quote: His face was tense, his jaw flexed as he stared at her. She could hardly stand to meet his eyes. They were an ocean of betrayal. They probed her, searching for the smallest sign that she didn't mean it. That spark of hope that never seemed to go out.

Author: Judy Collins
Quote: I look in the mirror through the eyes of the child that was me.

Author: Crystal Woodman Miller
Quote: Go make your mark on the world. Be a world changer! Live bold for Christ no matter the cost.

Author: Robert M. Drake
Quote: She needed the chaos within her in order to discover the extraordinary no man could ever reach.

Author: Andy Andrews
Quote: When you know that everything matters—that every move counts as much as any other—you will begin living a life of permanent purpose.

Author: Marilynne Robinson,  Home
Quote: I think hope is the worst thing in the world. I really do. It makes a fool of you while it lasts. And then when it's gone, it's like there's nothing left of you at all . . . except what you can't be rid of.

Author: May Water
Quote: Many things are thrown our way in this game of life. It's how you deal with them that shows your true character. I want all of you to feel the hope, love & passion I feel for the upcoming year & the rest of my life. I want ALL of you to not only go for your dreams, but have a damn ass good time doing it! Love & Warmth, May ♥

Author: Jonathan Kozol
Quote: When I was teaching in the 1960s in Boston, there was a great deal of hope in the air. Martin Luther King Jr. was alive, Malcolm X was alive; great, great leaders were emerging from the southern freedom movement.

Author: Roman Payne,  The Wanderess
Quote: Why do we mortals wonder if it is through 'human chaos' or through 'divine perfection' when the world guides us to some magical event? In either case, is not the result the same? Is the result not 'divine perfection?

Author: Patrick Ness,  The Knife of Never Letting Go
